data.subject: Pain
data.lyric:
[Verse 1]
 Go to bed now I can tell
 Pain is on the way out now
 Look away, a domino falls away
 
 I

data.subject: Strangest Thing
data.lyric:
Summer ride on the beach
 Howl at the day
 I've been hiding out so long
 I gotta find another way

data.subject: Holding On
data.lyric:
Once I was alive and I could feel
 I was holding on to you
 And I redefined the way I looked at dawn
